text: A2A is a multi-utility company.
And our business is

in the production,
generation production

and distribution of energy,
distribution and production of gas,

and also we have
the smart heating

we are collecting
and treating the waste.

And then we have
the water system.
Sustainability in A2A is crucial.

The sustainability goal
is to try to enlarge this kind of

sustainability concept
in all the areas of the company.

When we selected
the cloud service provider,

we had some analysis,
and we found that AWS

was the most effective 
and the most powerful for us.

We are going to use a couple
of Regions, AWS Regions in Europe,

with renewable energy,
so certified as a renewable.

I think the biggest benefit is
that AWS is always innovative.
We have

literally every month
something new.
AWS is a key partner for us.
AWS is working really
in sustainability with very focus

and very effort
in sustainability, and this is

something that we would
like to achieve together.
